biotools.summary: Falco is a quick and flexible single-cell RNA-seq processing framework on the cloud. Falco is a software bundle that enables bioinformatic analysis of large-scale transcriptomic data by utilising public cloud infrastructure. The framework currently provide supports for single cell RNA feature quantification, alignment and transcript assembly analyses.
